replies.bodyText:
already fixed in this PR.
now the flow is:

maven package the project, one step it would populate azure.properties with its current project.version.
jar now has this azure.properties packaged and released with the jar
runtime, code read version from azure.properties
replies.author: weidongxu-microsoft

timeline.message: read version from properties prepared by maven
